title: STAT+: Hospital group wants Trump administration to block a new Lilly policy on 340B claims data
description: The American Hospital Association is asking the Trump administration to stop Eli Lilly from enacting a new policy as part of the 340B drug discount program.
content: The American Hospital Association is asking the Trump administration to stop Eli Lilly from enacting a new policy as part of the 340B drug discount program.
